channel.title: [Delta][317] Adding Donor Shop [317][Delta]
channel.description:
Alright, I'v been searching all over the moparscape forums for about half an hour. I have found nothing.. I need help with making a donator shop.
First I edited all the settings to make it the shop id of the donator shop. Second I changed the item prices to 10 donor points or whatever. Third I compiled logged in and it said I need Coins & Donor points to buy the item. Can somebody help me? Don't say random garbage I mean can someone tell me what I'm doing wrong?
-Thanks
Edit: If someone could tell me how to make it so administrators+ can't trade with moderators+ players but CAN trade with other administrators+ I would really appreciate it. :)
